price: Wala usimt'ii kila mwingi wa kuapa wa kudharauliwa,
footnotes: Wala usiache mwendo wako ulio nao kwenda kinyume na kila mwingi wa viapo, mtu wa kudharauliwa,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
